name: The Last Bullet
description:
You play as Andre Parker, an agent sent on a suicidal mission. Your last hope of evacuation is the attainment of any and all hostages in the area. The Last Bullet tips a hat to the golden age of arcade video games while staying fresh and modern. Expect a moderately large world, riddled with zombies and bad guys. Will you go in guns blazing, or tip toe around your enemies? The choice is yours!




An immersive world
Explore a world engulfed in exposition. Get lost in an expansive apocalypse. At night, sneak carefully across the city to avoid zombies, and keep your shot straight during the day in case you wonder into any rogue militia.


Advanced Stealth Mechanics
If you pull that gun out - you better know how to use it! In the zombie apocalypse, ammo is scarce. If you run out of ammo, stealth will need to be your best friend if you want to survive.


Skill Based Combat
Praise be to the gunslinger. Lining up your shots perfectly makes survival a lot easier during an apocalypse. If all else fails, grab your shotgun to paint the town red. Good luck soldier.
